verses.verse: And it came to pass at the <S%H7093>end<s%> of two <S%H3117>full<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>, that <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H2492>dreamed<s%>: and, behold, he <S%H5975>stood<s%> by the <S%H2975>river<s%>.

And it came to pass in the <S%H1242>morning<s%> that his <S%H7307>spirit<s%> was <S%H6470>troubled<s%>; and he <S%H7971>sent<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> for all the <S%H2748>magicians<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, and all the wise <S%H2450>men<s%> thereof: and <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H5608>told<s%> them his <S%H2472>dream<s%>; but there was none that could <S%H6622>interpret<s%> them unto <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>.

And it came to pass, as he <S%H6622>interpreted<s%> to us, so it was; me he <S%H7725>restored<s%> unto mine <S%H3653>office<s%>, and him he <S%H8518>hanged<s%>.
